bioAsHtml: Christophe is an engineering lead & architect in the IBM Digital Process Automation group where he spend his days crafting Cloud Services leveraging the latest front-end, back-end, data processing and machine learning technologies. He was previously an architect in the IBM MobileFirst team where he lead the architecture and development of Mobile SDK generation. Before that he lead IBM contributions to Open Source Web frameworks for more than 3 years. Before joining IBM, Christophe worked for ILOG for more than a decade leading the development of visualization components for the Web and representing ILOG on Web standardization groups such as the W3C SVG Working Group.
